commit.message:
IGNITE-12808 Problems with one scenarion -- when query entities with custom
index added, B+ tree corruption occurs.
IGNITE-12808 Reproducer for scenario added. Surprisingly, after restarting partition recovers and everything works ok.
IGNITE-12808 Move index build futures to GridQueryProcessor
IGNITE-12808: Fix client reconnect and joining node cases.
IGNITE-12808 Patch context + fix and extend test.

nodes.bodyText: Javadoc
Does second condition matter? QueryUtils.isEnabled(cctx.config())
There is no tests added with non-default 'queryParallelism' .
Let's add clients nodes and check schema changes propagated correctly to clients.

This looks like a bug.
'beforeTestsStarted' is called before tests is started.
'beforeTest()' - is called before each test.
Do we support TRANSACTIONAL_SNAPSHOT for this feature? Let's add mode to tests
Typo: brackets required for multiline if.

nodes.bodyText:
What if we try to create table over the cache that already has QueryEntity defined?

Ignite.createCache("my-cache")
CREATE TABLE t1(ID LONG, NAME VARCHAR) WITH "CACHE_NAME=my-cache"
CREATE TABLE t2(ID LONG, NAME VARCHAR) WITH "CACHE_NAME=my-cache"

I expect exception on the third operation.
Let's add test for it.

nodes.bodyText:
Please, avoid nested code blocks.
This reduces code readability.
Let's just split this test.
Note, that afterTest perform stopAllGrids already.
Typo: please, remove empty line.

Do we support LOCAL caches?
If yes - let's just add a test to check it.
If no -  we should add an exception when the user tries to create a table over LOCAL cache and test to check it.

This method invoked only once.
Let's inline it.

It seems, the only change here - we move assert cacheCtx != null to the method start.
Can you, please, describe, why do we need it?
Can you, please, explain, why do we need this new check?
Can we add the test for this case?
Typo: Brackets for multiline if required.

+    static void validateSqlSchema(
+        DynamicCacheDescriptor locDesc,
+        StoredCacheData joinedData,
+        boolean isGridActive,
+        StringBuilder errorMsg
+    ) {
+        String joinedSchema = joinedData.config().getSqlSchema();
+        String locSchema = locDesc.cacheConfiguration().getSqlSchema();
+
+        // Peform checks of SQL schema. If schemas' names not equal, only valid case is if local or joined
+        // QuerySchema is empty and schema name is null (when indexing enabled dynamically).
+        if (!F.eq(joinedSchema, locSchema)
+            && (locSchema != null || !locDesc.schema().isEmpty())
+            && (joinedSchema != null || !F.isEmpty(joinedData.queryEntities()))
+        )
+            errorMsg.append(String.format(SQL_SCHEMA_CONFLICTS_MESSAGE, locDesc.cacheName(), joinedSchema,
+                locSchema));
+
+        QuerySchemaPatch schemaPatch = locDesc.makeSchemaPatch(joinedData.queryEntities());
+
+        if (schemaPatch.hasConflicts() || (isGridActive && !schemaPatch.isEmpty())) {
+            if (errorMsg.length() > 0)
+                errorMsg.append("\n");
+
+            if (schemaPatch.hasConflicts())
+                errorMsg.append(String.format(MERGE_OF_CONFIG_CONFLICTS_MESSAGE,

nodes.bodyText: Let's use new CacheConfiguration<> to remove compiler warning.
Let's use new CacheConfiguration<> to remove compiler warning
Let's use new CacheConfiguration<> to remove compiler warning
Can this method be invoked concurrently?
We have the same code inside DynamicCacheDescriptor#schemaChangeFinish and GridCacheContextInfo#onSchemaAddQueryEntity - let's deduplicate it and write in one place.
Why this change? Let's revert it.

commit.message:
IGNITE-12876 Extend test coverage to test deadlock absence between checkpoint, entry update and TTL worker - Fixes #7643.

Signed-off-by: Alexey Goncharuk <alexey.goncharuk@gmail.com>

IGNITE-13104 Fixed incorrect logic in spring-data repositories for findAllById() and deleteAllById() methods. Code cleanup. #7886 - Fixes #7886.

Signed-off-by: Alexey Kuznetsov <akuznetsov@apache.org>
IGNITE-13122: Fix NullPointerException on snapshot deletion (#7904)

IGNITE-13105 Fixed cursors leak in RunningQueryManager. Code cleanup. #7888 - Fixes #7888.

Signed-off-by: Alexey Kuznetsov <akuznetsov@apache.org>

IGNITE-13071 Improve test coverage for read-only cluster state - Fixes #7853.

Signed-off-by: Ivan Rakov <ivan.glukos@gmail.com>

IGNITE-13103 Fix SerializedLambda deployment by not registering capturingClass with marshaller - Fixes #7880.

Signed-off-by: Ilya Kasnacheev <ilya.kasnacheev@gmail.com>

IGNITE-13096 Java thin client: Fix binary type schema registration for nested objects - Fixes #7878.

Signed-off-by: Aleksey Plekhanov <plehanov.alex@gmail.com>

IGNITE-13088 Avoid NPE being thrown from checkProxyIsValid on client restart - Fixes #7873.

Signed-off-by: Ilya Kasnacheev <ilya.kasnacheev@gmail.com>
IGNITE-13119 fix data race when getting index rebuild status (#7901)
IGNITE-12808 Remove duplicate commited by mistake.
IGNITE-12808 Remove redundant param and condition from rebuild hash procedure.

nodes.bodyText:
Can we rewrite this statement to make it more readable:
(nop || (!cacheRegistered && !(op instanceof SchemaAddQueryEntityOperation)))

We want to say here: Complete the future if
1. There is no operation OR
2. Cache not registered AND operation is not SchemaAddQueryEntityOperation
